{"id":367509339,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1594922205,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/367509339/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        \n        int original_n = n; \n        \n        \n        \n        double ans = 1; \n        n = abs(n); \n        while(n > 0) {\n            if (n & 1) {\n                ans *= x; \n            }\n            x *= x;\n            n >>= 1; \n        }\n        if (original_n < 0) {\n            return 1/ans;\n        } else {\n            return ans; \n        }\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
